title: Can't create/join a lobby
body: When I go to start a game and hover over "Lobby" it says "We aren't able to create a lobby right now. Please exit the client and re-open it to try again." When I do that it says "We have restored the installation to an older version of League of Legends. Now we'll try and patch it up to the latest version." Except nothing happens, I login and it's just the same problem over and over again. I have tried the full repair button for settings on the login screen and even uninstalling and reinstalling multiple times yet nothing has worked.

replies.body: Having this same problem now. Already ran the full repair, it did nothing. Tried switching regions, did nothing. Now reinstalling.

Hmmmm it sounds like your client might have some damaged files lying around somewhere even after reinstalling. Grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it using a **force repatch** first. If that still doesn't work, go ahead and run the tool with **reinstall and clean uninstall** and that should do the trick, albeit taking a bit longer.

Ok thank you. This might be a stupid question but how do I give it admin privileges so it can do the force repatch?

Edit the reason I ask is it doesn't give me the option the run as admin when I right click on the icon.
When you go to launch the tool, right click and select run as administrator and that should let you in.

This is what it looks like when I right click it. 

http://imgur.com/a/8fXTL

Okay, so click on Properties, then Compatability at the top, and then at the bottom check "Run this program as administrator"
https://i.gyazo.com/c1e582caab4b05219be6534aa5087b5b.png
Ok got it running as admin and trying repatch now. Thank you.
When I tried running the app a popup saying "chromium embedded framework (cef) client application has stopped working" forced me to close it.

Meeeerrrrrrr......that HRT is being pretty stubborn tonight eh?

Let's make sure this gets fixed up without having to go back and forth waiting on responses! Go ahead and reach out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to walk you through everything to make sure you're back on the Rift.
I said screw it after the tenth time of it and am trying the clean uninstall and reinstall and it seems to be working so far but if it doesn't I will do that. Thank you for all of you help.
When I right click it it doesn't give me the option.
